summary: A look at 1970s Hollywood when it was known as New Hollywood, and the director was the star of the movie.
cast: Martin Scorsese|Dennis Hopper|Peter Bogdanovich|Sam Peckinpah|Warren Beatty|Robert Altman|Arthur Penn|Jack Nicholson|Francis Ford Coppola|Steven Spielberg|George Lucas|Tony Bill|Peter Bart|Paul Schrader|Sharon Tate|Roman Polanski|Margot Kidder|David Newman|Dede Allen|Peter Fonda|Roger Corman|László Kovács|Polly Platt|Henry Jaglom|Richard Dreyfuss|Jennifer Salt|Karen Black|Peter Tork|Ellen Burstyn|Micky Dolenz|Jerome Hellman|David V. Newton|Rudy Wurlitzer|Sandra Weintraub|Toby Carr Rafelson|Marcia Lucas|Carl Gottlieb|Candice Bergen|Ernest Borgnine|Joan Collins|Robert De Niro|George Harrison|Monte Hellman|Davy Jones|Harvey Keitel|John Lennon|William H. title: La generación que cambió Hollywood
